Public: GET, PUT, HEAD, POST, DELETE, TRACE, OPTIONS, PATCH
GET, PUT, HEAD, POST, DELETE, TRACE, OPTIONS, PATCH
GET, PUT, HEAD, POST, DELETE, TRACE, OPTIONS, PATCH

body.string:
{
  "status": 0,
  "log": "",
  "results":   [
          {
              "actions":   [
                      {
                          "desc": "Adds a machine to the server",
                          "label": "Add node",
                          "name": "addNode",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "allowedValues":   [
                                            "controller",
                                            "worker"
                                          ],
                                      "desc": "specifies the role for the machine. Controllers are added as backup controllers. Only two controllers are supported.",
                                      "label": "Role",
                                      "name": "role",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "default": [ ],
                                      "desc": "specifies the host names of the machines to add to the server.",
                                      "hasInclMin": true,
                                      "label": "Node",
                                      "name": "node",
                                      "parmType": "value_list",
                                      "type": 11,
                                      "valueMin": 1
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Remove one or more machines from the server",
                          "label": "Remove node",
                          "name": "removeNode",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "default": [ ],
                                      "desc": "specifies the host names of the machines to remove from the server.",
                                      "hasInclMin": true,
                                      "label": "Node",
                                      "name": "node",
                                      "parmType": "value_list",
                                      "type": 11,
                                      "valueMin": 1
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shows the parameters for an action or lists all available actions",
                          "label": "Help",
                          "name": "help",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the action for which you want help. The name can be in the form 'actionSetName.actionName' or just 'actionName.",
                                      "label": "Action",
                                      "name": "action",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the action set for which you want help. This parameter is ignored if the action parameter is specified.",
                                      "label": "Action set",
                                      "name": "actionSet",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "default": true,
                                      "desc": "when set to True, provides more detail for each parameter.",
                                      "label": "Verbose",
                                      "name": "verbose",
                                      "parmType": "boolean",
                                      "type": 5
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shows the host names used by the server",
                          "label": "List nodes",
                          "name": "listNodes",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "default": false,
                                      "desc": "when set to True, the client log includes the server port number.",
                                      "label": "Verbose",
                                      "name": "verbose",
                                      "parmType": "boolean",
                                      "type": 5
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Loads an action set for use in this session",
                          "label": "Load action set",
                          "name": "loadActionSet",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the action set to load.",
                                      "isRequired": true,
                                      "label": "Action set",
                                      "name": "actionSet",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Loads an action set in new sessions automatically",
                          "label": "Install action set",
                          "name": "installActionSet",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the action set to load. The actions from the action set are available to the current session and every session that is started after this action runs.",
                                      "isRequired": true,
                                      "label": "Action set",
                                      "name": "actionSet",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shows and modifies logging levels",
                          "label": "Logging levels",
                          "name": "log",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the logger to modify.",
                                      "label": "Logger name",
                                      "name": "logger",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "allowedValues":   [
                                            "all",
                                            "debug",
                                            "error",
                                            "fatal",
                                            "info",
                                            "null",
                                            "off",
                                            "trace",
                                            "warn"
                                          ],
                                      "desc": "specifies the logging level to set.",
                                      "label": "Logging level",
                                      "name": "level",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "default": false,
                                      "desc": "specifies that the log change should also be sent to the server controller.",
                                      "label": "Server Controller",
                                      "name": "onMain",
                                      "parmType": "boolean",
                                      "type": 5
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "default": false,
                                      "desc": "specifies that the log change should also be sent to new sessions.",
                                      "label": "New Sessions",
                                      "name": "newSessions",
                                      "parmType": "boolean",
                                      "type": 5
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shows whether an action set is loaded",
                          "label": "Checks action set",
                          "name": "queryActionSet",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the action to check.",
                                      "isRequired": true,
                                      "label": "Action set",
                                      "name": "actionSet",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Checks whether a name is an action or action set name",
                          "label": "Check name",
                          "name": "queryName",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the action or action set to look up.",
                                      "isRequired": true,
                                      "label": "Name",
                                      "name": "name",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shows detailed parameter information for an action or all actions in an action set",
                          "label": "Action details",
                          "name": "reflect",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the action set to reflect. If not specified, then details for all action sets are reflected. This parameter is ignored if the action parameter is specified.",
                                      "label": "Action set",
                                      "name": "actionSet",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the name of the action to reflect. The name can be in the form 'actionsetname.actionname' or just 'actionname.' If you do not specify an action, then details for all actions in an action set are shown.",
                                      "label": "Action",
                                      "name": "action",
                                      "parmType": "string",
                                      "type": 4
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "default": [ ],
                                      "desc": "specifies action-specific options for the action to reflect that can affect the reflected parameters. Most actions do not implement dynamic options.",
                                      "keyedList": true,
                                      "label": "Dynamic options",
                                      "name": "dynamicOptions",
                                      "parmType": "value_list",
                                      "type": 11
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shows the status of the server",
                          "label": "Server status",
                          "name": "serverStatus",
                          "params": [ ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shows the status of the server",
                          "label": "About",
                          "name": "about",
                          "params": [ ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shuts down the server",
                          "label": "Shutdown",
                          "name": "shutdown",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "default": 30,
                                      "desc": "specifies the number of seconds to wait before the shutdown is enforced.",
                                      "label": "Time-out",
                                      "name": "timeout",
                                      "parmType": "int64",
                                      "type": 2
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "autoRetry": true,
                          "desc": "Shows the user information for your connection",
                          "label": "User information",
                          "name": "userInfo",
                          "params": [ ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Shows the build information from loaded action sets",
                          "label": "Action set information",
                          "name": "actionSetInfo",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "default": false,
                                      "desc": "when set to True, the results include all the available action sets as well as loaded action sets. This action runs more slowly when set to True.",
                                      "label": "All",
                                      "name": "all",
                                      "parmType": "boolean",
                                      "type": 5
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "autoRetry": true,
                          "desc": "Shows the actions that were run in this session",
                          "label": "Action history",
                          "name": "history",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "default": 1,
                                      "desc": "specifies the ordinal position for the first action to report on. Negative values are subtracted from the current action's ordinal position.",
                                      "label": "First action",
                                      "name": "first",
                                      "parmType": "int32",
                                      "type": 1
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "default": -1,
                                      "desc": "specifies the ordinal position of the last action to report on. Negative values are subtracted from the current action's ordinal position.",
                                      "label": "Last action",
                                      "name": "last",
                                      "parmType": "int32",
                                      "type": 1
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "default": true,
                                      "desc": "prints action information to the client log as well as returns the action information in the results.",
                                      "label": "Verbose",
                                      "name": "verbose",
                                      "parmType": "boolean",
                                      "type": 5
                                    },
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the settings for saving the action history to an output table.",
                                      "isOutTableDef": true,
                                      "label": "Output table",
                                      "name": "casOut",
                                      "parmList":   [
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies the name to associate with the table.",
                                                  "isTableName": true,
                                                  "label": "Name",
                                                  "name": "name",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies the name of the caslib to use.",
                                                  "isCasLib": true,
                                                  "label": "Caslib",
                                                  "name": "caslib",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies the timestamp to apply to the table. Specify the value in the form that is appropriate for your session locale.",
                                                  "label": "Timestamp",
                                                  "name": "timeStamp",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "default": false,
                                                  "desc": "when set to True, data compression is applied to the table.",
                                                  "label": "Compress",
                                                  "name": "compress",
                                                  "parmType": "boolean",
                                                  "type": 5
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "default": false,
                                                  "desc": "when set to True, overwrites an existing table with the same name.",
                                                  "label": "Replace",
                                                  "name": "replace",
                                                  "parmType": "boolean",
                                                  "type": 5
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "default": 1,
                                                  "desc": "specifies the number of copies of the table to make for fault tolerance. Larger values result in slower performance and use more memory, but provide high availability for data in the event of a node failure.",
                                                  "hasInclMin": true,
                                                  "label": "Replications",
                                                  "name": "replication",
                                                  "parmType": "int32",
                                                  "type": 1,
                                                  "valueMin": 0
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies the descriptive label to associate with the table.",
                                                  "label": "Label",
                                                  "name": "label",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "byteMeasure": true,
                                                  "default": 0,
                                                  "desc": "specifies the maximum amount of memory, in bytes, that each thread should allocate for in-memory blocks before converting to a memory-mapped file. Files are written in the directories that are specified in the CAS_DISK_CACHE environment variable.",
                                                  "label": "Memory threshold",
                                                  "name": "maxMemSize",
                                                  "parmType": "int64",
                                                  "type": 2
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "default": false,
                                                  "desc": "when set to True, adds the output table with a global scope. This enables other sessions to access the table, subject to access controls. The target caslib must also have a global scope.",
                                                  "label": "Promote",
                                                  "name": "promote",
                                                  "parmType": "boolean",
                                                  "type": 5
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "default": true,
                                                  "desc": "This parameter is deprecated.",
                                                  "label": "On demand",
                                                  "name": "onDemand",
                                                  "parmType": "boolean",
                                                  "type": 5
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "default": [ ],
                                                  "desc": "specifies an expression for subsetting the output data.",
                                                  "label": "Filter",
                                                  "name": "where",
                                                  "parmType": "value_list",
                                                  "type": 11
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "default": [ ],
                                                  "desc": "specifies the list of variables to create indexes for in the output data",
                                                  "isVar": true,
                                                  "label": "indexVars",
                                                  "name": "indexVars",
                                                  "parmType": "value_list",
                                                  "type": 11
                                                }
                                          ],
                                      "parmListTag": "casouttable",
                                      "parmType": "value_list",
                                      "type": 11
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                      {
                          "desc": "Provides parameters that are common to many actions",
                          "label": "Common parameters",
                          "name": "casCommon",
                          "params":   [
                                  {
                                      "desc": "specifies the settings for an input table.",
                                      "isTableDef": true,
                                      "label": "Table",
                                      "name": "casTable",
                                      "parmList":   [
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies the name of the table to use.",
                                                  "isRequired": true,
                                                  "isTableName": true,
                                                  "label": "Name",
                                                  "name": "name",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies the caslib that contains the table that you want to use with the action. By default, the active caslib is used. Specify a value only if you need to access a table from a different caslib.",
                                                  "isCasLib": true,
                                                  "label": "Caslib",
                                                  "name": "caslib",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies an expression for subsetting the input data.",
                                                  "isWhere": true,
                                                  "label": "Filter",
                                                  "name": "where",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies the names of the variables to use for grouping results.",
                                                  "exemplar":   [
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the name for the variable.",
                                                              "isRequired": true,
                                                              "isVar": true,
                                                              "label": "Name",
                                                              "name": "name",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the descriptive label for the variable.",
                                                              "label": "Label",
                                                              "name": "label",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of format field plus the format precision.",
                                                              "label": "Formatted length",
                                                              "name": "formattedLength",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the format to apply to the variable.",
                                                              "label": "Format",
                                                              "name": "format",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of the format field.",
                                                              "label": "Format field length",
                                                              "name": "nfl",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of the format precision.",
                                                              "label": "Format precision length",
                                                              "name": "nfd",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            }
                                                      ],
                                                  "isGroupBy": true,
                                                  "label": "Group by",
                                                  "name": "groupBy",
                                                  "parmType": "value_list",
                                                  "type": 11,
                                                  "uiGroup": "By Groups"
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "desc": "specifies the variables to use for ordering observations within partitions. This parameter applies to partitioned tables, or it can be combined with variables that are specified in the groupBy parameter when the value of the groupByMode parameter is set to REDISTRIBUTE.",
                                                  "exemplar":   [
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the name for the variable.",
                                                              "isRequired": true,
                                                              "isVar": true,
                                                              "label": "Name",
                                                              "name": "name",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the descriptive label for the variable.",
                                                              "label": "Label",
                                                              "name": "label",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of format field plus the format precision.",
                                                              "label": "Formatted length",
                                                              "name": "formattedLength",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the format to apply to the variable.",
                                                              "label": "Format",
                                                              "name": "format",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of the format field.",
                                                              "label": "Format field length",
                                                              "name": "nfl",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of the format precision.",
                                                              "label": "Format precision length",
                                                              "name": "nfd",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            }
                                                      ],
                                                  "isOrderBy": true,
                                                  "label": "Order by",
                                                  "name": "orderBy",
                                                  "parmType": "value_list",
                                                  "type": 11
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "aliases":   [
                                                        "compVars"
                                                      ],
                                                  "desc": "specifies the names of the computed variables to create. Specify an expression for each variable in the computedVarsProgram parameter.",
                                                  "exemplar":   [
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the name for the variable.",
                                                              "isRequired": true,
                                                              "isVar": true,
                                                              "label": "Name",
                                                              "name": "name",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the descriptive label for the variable.",
                                                              "label": "Label",
                                                              "name": "label",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of format field plus the format precision.",
                                                              "label": "Formatted length",
                                                              "name": "formattedLength",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "desc": "specifies the format to apply to the variable.",
                                                              "label": "Format",
                                                              "name": "format",
                                                              "parmType": "string",
                                                              "type": 4
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of the format field.",
                                                              "label": "Format field length",
                                                              "name": "nfl",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "default": 0,
                                                              "desc": "specifies the length of the format precision.",
                                                              "label": "Format precision length",
                                                              "name": "nfd",
                                                              "parmType": "int32",
                                                              "type": 1
                                                            }
                                                      ],
                                                  "isCompVar": true,
                                                  "label": "Computed variables",
                                                  "name": "computedVars",
                                                  "parmType": "value_list",
                                                  "type": 11,
                                                  "uiGroup": "Computed"
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "aliases":   [
                                                        "compPgm"
                                                      ],
                                                  "desc": "specifies an expression for each computed variable that you include in the computedVars parameter.",
                                                  "label": "Computed variable expressions",
                                                  "name": "computedVarsProgram",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4,
                                                  "uiGroup": "Computed"
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "allowedValues":   [
                                                        "NOSORT",
                                                        "REDISTRIBUTE"
                                                      ],
                                                  "default": "NOSORT",
                                                  "desc": "specifies how to create groups.",
                                                  "label": "Group-by mode",
                                                  "name": "groupByMode",
                                                  "parmType": "string",
                                                  "type": 4,
                                                  "uiGroup": "By Groups"
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "aliases":   [
                                                        "compOnDemand"
                                                      ],
                                                  "default": false,
                                                  "desc": "when set to True, creates the computed variables when the table is loaded instead of when the action begins.",
                                                  "label": "Compute on demand",
                                                  "name": "computedOnDemand",
                                                  "parmType": "boolean",
                                                  "type": 5,
                                                  "uiGroup": "Computed"
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "default": false,
                                                  "desc": "when set to True, does not create a transient table on the server. Setting this parameter to True can be efficient, but the data might not have stable ordering upon repeated runs.",
                                                  "label": "Single pass",
                                                  "name": "singlePass",
                                                  "parmType": "boolean",
                                                  "type": 5
                                                },
                                              {
                                                  "aliases":   [
                                                        "import"
                                                      ],
                                                  "alternatives":   [
                                                          {
                                                              "name": "alt_autoopts",
                                                              "parmList":   [
                                                                      {
                                                                          "aliases":   [
                                                                                "ft"
                                                                              ],
                                                                          "allowedValues":   [
                                                                                "auto"
                                                                              ],
                                                                          "desc": "specifies the file type based on the filename suffix.  Default values for the parameters related to the file type are used.",
                                                                          "label": "File type",
                                                                          "name": "fileType",
                                                                          "parmType": "string",
                                                                          "type": 4
                                                                        }
                                                                  ],
                                                              "parmListTag": "autoopts",
                                                              "parmType": "value_list",
                                                              "type": 11
                                                            },
                                                          {
                                                              "name": "alt_hdatopts",

                                                                              ],

                                                                          "isRequired": true,
                                                                          "label": "File type",
                                                                          "name": "fileType",
                                                                          "parmType": "string",
                                                                          "type": 4
                                                                        },

                                                                                    },

                                                                                      "type": 13
                                                                                    }
                                                                              ],
                                                                          "desc": "specifies a password for encrypting or decrypting stored data.",
                                                                          "hidevalue": true,
                                                                          "isPassword": true,
                                                                          "label": "Data encryption password",
                                                                          "name": "encryptionPassword",
                                                                          "parmType": "value_list",
                                                                          "type": 11
                                                                        }
